chat_completion.description: Generate assistant replies using chat-style LLMs - perfect for FAQ bots, support agents, and content generation

props.name: useCase
props.description: What type of chat assistant are you building?

props.name: model
props.description: Select the best model for your use case

props.name: conversationMode
props.description: How do you want to build the conversation?

props.name: userMessage
props.description: The user message or question to respond to

props.name: systemPrompt
props.description: Instructions for how the assistant should behave

props.name: conversationHistory
props.description: Previous messages in the conversation (for multi-turn chat)

props.name: template
props.description: Pre-built templates for common business scenarios

props.name: responseLength
props.description: How long should the response be?

props.name: customMaxTokens
props.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

props.name: temperature
props.description: How creative should responses be? (0.1 = focused, 1.0 = creative)

props.name: topP
props.description: Controls response diversity (0.1 = focused, 1.0 = varied)

props.name: stopSequences
props.description: Text sequences that will stop generation

props.name: frequencyPenalty
props.description: Reduce repetitive responses (-2.0 to 2.0)

props.name: presencePenalty
props.description: Encourage diverse topics (-2.0 to 2.0)

props.name: useCache
props.description: Use cached responses for identical requests

props.name: waitForModel
props.description: Wait for model to load if not immediately available

create_image.description: Generate stunning images from text prompts using state-of-the-art diffusion models - perfect for marketing, product design, and creative content

props.name: useCase
props.description: What type of image generation do you need?

props.name: model
props.description: Select the best model for your use case

props.name: prompt
props.description: Describe the image you want to generate. Be specific about style, colors, composition, and details.

props.name: aspectRatio
props.description: Choose the dimensions for your image

props.name: customWidth
props.description: Width in pixels (64-1024)

props.name: customHeight
props.description: Height in pixels (64-1024)

props.name: negativePrompt
props.description: Describe what you DON'T want in the image (blur, low quality, distorted, etc.)

props.name: qualitySettings
props.description: Balance between image quality and generation time

props.name: customSteps
props.description: Number of denoising steps (1-100)

props.name: guidanceScale
props.description: How closely to follow the prompt (1-20). Higher values = more prompt adherence but may reduce creativity.

props.name: seed
props.description: Set a seed for reproducible results. Leave empty for random generation.

props.name: scheduler
props.description: Advanced: Choose the noise scheduler algorithm

document_question_answering.description: Answer questions from document images using Hugging Face models

props.name: model
props.description: Hugging Face document question answering model

props.name: image
props.description: Image of the document to analyze (invoice, contract, etc.)

props.name: question
props.description: Question to ask about the document (e.g., 'What is the invoice total?')

props.name: top_k
props.description: Number of top answers to return

props.name: max_answer_len
props.description: Maximum length of predicted answers

props.name: handle_impossible_answer
props.description: Whether to accept 'impossible' as an answer when no answer is found

props.name: lang
props.description: Language to use for OCR text extraction

props.name: use_cache
props.description: Use cached results if available

props.name: wait_for_model
props.description: Wait for model to load if not ready

image_classification.description: Classify images with pre-trained models or custom categories - perfect for content moderation, automated tagging, and smart asset management

props.name: classificationMode
props.description: How do you want to classify your images?

props.name: useCase
props.description: What type of image classification do you need?

props.name: model
props.description: Select the best model for your use case

props.name: imageSource
props.description: How do you want to provide the image?

props.name: imageFile
props.description: Upload an image file for classification (JPG, PNG, WebP)

props.name: imageUrl
props.description: URL of the image to classify

props.name: customCategories
props.description: Enter the categories you want to classify the image into (e.g., "dog", "cat", "bird")

props.name: hypothesisTemplate
props.description: Template for classification (advanced). Default: "This image shows {}"

props.name: topK
props.description: Maximum number of classification results to return (1-20)

props.name: confidenceThreshold
props.description: Minimum confidence score for results (0.0-1.0)

props.name: outputFormat
props.description: How to structure the classification results

language_translation.description: Translate text between languages using specialized Hugging Face translation models

props.name: model
props.description: Select a translation model or search from 7000+ available models

props.name: customModel
props.description: Alternative: Enter any Hugging Face translation model ID directly (e.g., Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-ja-en)

props.name: text
props.description: The text content you want to translate

props.name: sourceLanguage
props.description: Source language code (e.g., "en", "es", "fr"). Only needed for multilingual models that support multiple language pairs.

props.name: targetLanguage
props.description: Target language code (e.g., "fr", "de", "zh"). Only needed for multilingual models that support multiple language pairs.

props.name: cleanUpSpaces
props.description: Remove potential extra spaces in the translation output

props.name: maxLength
props.description: Maximum length of the translated text (leave empty for default)

props.name: useCache
props.description: Use cached results if available for faster responses

props.name: waitForModel
props.description: Wait for model to load if not immediately available

object_detection.description: Detect and locate objects in images with precise bounding boxes - perfect for inventory management, content moderation, and automated tagging

props.name: useCase
props.description: What type of object detection do you need?

props.name: model
props.description: Select the best model for your detection task

props.name: image
props.description: Upload an image for object detection. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP formats.

props.name: confidenceThreshold
props.description: Minimum confidence score for detections (0.1-0.9). Higher values = fewer but more accurate detections.

props.name: maxDetections
props.description: Maximum number of objects to detect (1-100)

props.name: filterSettings
props.description: How to handle detection results

props.name: outputFormat
props.description: How to structure the detection results

text_classification.description: Classify text into categories using Hugging Face models - includes zero-shot classification for custom categories

props.name: classificationMode
props.description: Choose your classification approach

props.name: zeroShotModel
props.description: Model for classifying into your custom categories

props.name: customLabels
props.description: Enter categories separated by commas (e.g., "customer support, sales inquiry, spam, billing question")

props.name: pretrainedModel
props.description: Select a specialized pre-trained classification model

props.name: searchModel
props.description: Search from all available text classification models

props.name: text
props.description: The text content you want to classify

props.name: topK
props.description: Number of top predictions to return

props.name: functionToApply
props.description: How to calculate confidence scores

props.name: useCache
props.description: Use cached results for faster responses

props.name: waitForModel
props.description: Wait for model to load if not immediately available

text_summarization.description: Generate abstractive summaries of long text using Hugging Face models - optimized for business content

props.name: contentType
props.description: What type of content are you summarizing?

props.name: model
props.description: Select the best model for your content type

props.name: text
props.description: The long text content you want to summarize (most models work best with 512-1024 tokens)

props.name: summaryLength
props.description: How long should the summary be?

props.name: customMinLength
props.description: Minimum number of tokens for the summary

props.name: customMaxLength
props.description: Maximum number of tokens for the summary

props.name: cleanUpSpaces
props.description: Remove extra spaces and clean up formatting

props.name: truncationStrategy
props.description: How to handle text that exceeds model limits

props.name: useCache
props.description: Use cached results for faster responses

props.name: waitForModel
props.description: Wait for model to load if not immediately available
